de.japi.components

Class Japi2Choice

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JComboBox
            • de.japi.components.Japi2Choice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.ListDataListener

    public class Japi2Choice
extends javax.swing.JComboBox
    Jap2Choice class to construct drop-down choice boxes. In swing, the former Choice component is now calles JComboBox.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
